summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing an Easement and Agreement with the State of Washington, State Board for Community College Education on behalf of Bellevue Community College; and accepting an easement over, across an upon a portion of the northeast one-quarter of Section 10, Township 24 North, Range 5 East, W.M., King County, Washington, for water pump station. (TESS pump stations - S.E. 28th St.)
